BBEX3.M.SCR.USD.CA.AA.A01: Exchange rates for the US dollar in the Seychelles / USD 1 = SCR ... (buying)
Source: Central Bank of Seychelles, Victoria
Comment on 1981-03: On 16 March 1981, the Seychelles rupee was revalued by 15% against the special drawing right.
Comment on 2008-01: On 1 November 2008, the currency ceased to be pegged to a currency basket and the exchange rate for the Seychelles rupee was allowed to float freely.
